snippet: Peter O’Mahony was ruled out of the rest of the tournament with a knee injury.
abstract: Irish Rugby Football Union announces flanker Peter O'Mahony will not play rest of Rugby World Cup due to injury.
lead_paragraph: Peter O’Mahony was ruled out of the rest of the tournament with a knee injury.

headline.print_headline: Ireland Flanker Is Out of World Cup
headline.main: Ireland Flanker Is Out of World Cup With Injury
